Standard circle marker

Source: R/icons.R
icon_circle.Rd

The marker is based on Material Design (Apache 2.0 License): https://material.io/

icon_circle()

Value

SVG code for a map marker.

Examples

icon_circle()
#> [1] "<g transform=\"translate(-12,-12)\">\n <path d=\"M2 12C2 6.48 6.48 2 12 2s10 4.48 10 10-4.48 10-10 10S2 17.52 2 12zm10 6c3.31 0 6-2.69 6-6s-2.69-6-6-6-6 2.69-6 6 2.69 6 6 6z\"/>\n </g>"
